item.title: 瑞安航空因波音飞机提前交付上调客运量与票价预期
item.description: 瑞安航空控股公司上调了全年乘客增长和票价预期，这家爱尔兰廉价航空公司受益于波音公司飞机交付量的提升以及更强劲的出行需求。【原文：Ryanair Holdings Plc raised its full-year guidance for passenger growth and fares as the Irish budget carrier benefits from improved Boeing Co. aircraft deliveries and stronger travel demand.】

item.title: 数字医疗初创企业Docplanner首席执行官认为人工智能将推动公司上市前增长
item.description: 一家运营全球最大医疗数字平台之一的初创企业，正试图利用人工智能技术挖掘其海量医疗数据的价值，这可能为诊断领域开启新纪元，并为该公司上市奠定基础。【原文：A startup that runs one of the world’s largest health-care digital platforms is seeking to leverage artificial intelligence to capitalize on its trove of medical data, potentially ushering in a new era for diagnostics and positioning the firm for a public listing.】

item.title: 黑石计划在亚洲扩大招聘规模以满足私募市场需求
item.description: 黑石集团亚太区私人财富业务负责人黄艾德表示，该公司计划在亚洲各地增聘人手，以把握私募市场日益增长的机遇。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is planning to hire more people across Asia to tap growing opportunities in private markets, said Ed Huang, the firm’s head of Asia Pacific private wealth.】

item.title: 与皮帕·马尔姆格伦同游格陵兰：为何北极成为新地缘政治战场
item.description: 地缘政治研究所首席执行官皮帕·马尔姆格伦从格陵兰岛发回报道，阐释北极为何成为地缘政治棋盘的核心——从美国以国家安全为由主张接管丹麦属地，到格陵兰人渴望保持独立而不被"出售"。 她将北极议题与更广泛的局势变迁相联系：围绕俄罗斯对乌克兰战争的和平谈判、紧张的欧洲联盟关系、中俄互动格局，以及太空与能源领域的技术竞赛。【原文：Pippa Malmgren, chief executive of Geopolitica Institute, reports from Greenland on why the Arctic is now at the center of the geopolitical chessboard — from US claims that it needs to take over the Danish territory for national security reasons to how Greenlanders want to remain independent without being “for sale.” She connects the Arctic story to wider shifts: peace talks over Russia’s war on Ukraine, strained European alliances, China–Russia dynamics and technological races in space, energy】

item.title: 摩根士丹利称英国受人工智能裁员冲击最重
item.description: 英国因人工智能而流失的岗位多于新增岗位——且失业速度快于其他国家。【原文：The UK is losing more jobs than it’s creating because of artificial intelligence — and at a faster rate than its international peers.】

item.title: 英仕集团支持的Revego公司为南非能源项目筹得6200万美元
item.description: Revego非洲能源基金在2021年后的首次融资中筹集了10亿兰特（约合6200万美元），这家由英仕银行有限公司支持的企业正致力于为南非的可再生能源项目提供资金支持。【原文：Revego Africa Energy Fund raised 1 billion rand ($62 million) in its first capital-raising round since 2021 as the Investec Bank Ltd.-backed firm seeks to bankroll renewable power projects in South Africa.】

item.title: 韩国小盘股创下2000年以来对Kospi指数的最佳表现日
item.description: 韩国小型股指数飙升至逾四年高点，其涨幅创2000年以来最大，显著跑赢基准Kospi指数，表明市场对韩国股票的热情正在扩大。【原文：South Korea’s small-cap stock index soared to the highest in more than four years and outperformed the benchmark Kospi Index by the most since 2000, in a sign that enthusiasm toward the country’s shares is broadening.】

item.title: 软银叫停收购数据中心公司Switch的谈判
item.description: 知情人士透露，软银集团已暂停收购美国数据中心运营商Switch公司的谈判，这对其创始人孙正义部署Stargate人工智能基础设施的雄心构成打击。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. has halted talks about an acquisition of US data center operator Switch Inc., a setback to founder Masayoshi Son’s ambition to roll out Stargate AI infrastructure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 为何市场未受美国暴风雪影响
item.description:
尽管天气阴沉，新闻也令人沮丧，但正酝酿着一股积极向上的力量。

【原文：

Despite gloom in the weather and news, there’s a very positive move afoot.

】

item.title: 中国将向外国投资者开放镍和锂期货市场
item.description: 中国将允许海外投资者投资国内镍和锂期货，这是北京方面为提升其在全球大宗商品市场影响力所做努力的一部分。【原文：China will allow overseas investors to invest in domestic nickel and lithium futures, part of Beijing’s efforts to boost its influence in global commodities markets.】

item.title: 亚洲矿业股上涨，实物资产交易加速
item.description: 亚洲矿业股随金属价格攀升，投资者转向实物资产，这主要受到美元走弱以及对货币、地缘政治和全球财政风险日益加剧的担忧推动。【原文：Asian mining stocks climbed with metals prices as investors rotated into hard assets, driven by a weakening dollar and growing unease over currencies, geopolitics and global fiscal risks.】

item.title: 现代牙科因希尔豪斯交易飙升至逾四年高点
item.description: 香港上市企业现代牙科集团有限公司的股价周一早盘飙升近18%，创下2021年12月以来新高，此前高瓴资本收购了该公司的重要少数股权。【原文：Shares of Hong Kong-listed Modern Dental Group Ltd. jumped almost 18% Monday morning to the highest since December 2021 after Hillhouse Investment bought a significant minority stake in the firm.】

item.title: 新加坡元兑美元汇率创逾11年来新高
item.description: 在避险资金涌入的背景下，新加坡元兑美元汇率升至2014年10月以来的最高水平，且该国央行本周预计将维持政策设置不变。【原文：The Singapore dollar climbed to its strongest level since October 2014 versus the greenback amid safe-haven flows, and with the nation’s central bank expected to leave its policy settings unchanged this week.】

item.title: 铜价延续涨势，美元疲软推高金属价格
item.description: 铜价延续涨势——上周五已飙升近3%——因美元持续走弱提振了基本金属市场。【原文：Copper extended gains — after jumping almost 3% on Friday — as continued weakness in the dollar buoyed base metals.】

item.title: 韩元走强，美元下跌推动新兴市场货币创历史新高
item.description: 韩元表现优于亚洲其他货币，新兴市场货币创下历史新高，因美元下跌引发市场担忧美日可能联合干预汇率。【原文：The South Korean won outperformed Asian peers while emerging-market currencies touched a record high as the dollar fell on concerns of possible joint intervention by the US and Japan.】

item.title: 三星即将获得英伟达对关键HBM4人工智能内存芯片的批准
item.description: 三星电子即将获得英伟达公司对其最新一代人工智能内存芯片HBM4的认证，在缩小与竞争对手SK海力士的差距方面取得进展。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is getting close to securing certification from Nvidia Corp. for the latest version of its AI memory chip, called HBM4, making progress in narrowing the gap with rival SK Hynix Inc.】

item.title: 东京电力将出售房地产，寻求新业务计划合作伙伴
item.description: 东京电力公司计划在三年内出售约2000亿日元（13亿美元）的资产，以筹集福岛核电站清理资金并满足不断增长的电力需求。【原文：Tokyo Electric Power Co. is aiming to sell around 200 billion yen ($1.3 billion) of assets within three years, as it looks to fund its Fukushima clean-up efforts and meet rising power demand.】

item.title: 印度液化天然气买家暂停交易，静待创纪录供应浪潮
item.description: 印度液化天然气进口商正搁置部分持续数十年的交易，力图锁定更低价格，期待供应激增能使谈判天平向己方倾斜。【原文：India’s liquefied natural gas importers are holding up some deals spanning decades as they push to lock in cheaper prices, hoping that a surge in supply will tilt negotiations in their favor.】

item.title: 美国最大电网敦促发电厂确保本周天然气供应
item.description: 美国最大的电网运营商正敦促发电厂确保本周天然气供应，因预计严寒天气将使电力使用量创下冬季新高。【原文：The largest US grid operator is pushing power plants to secure natural gas supplies through the week amid expectations that frigid temperatures will drive electricity usage to a winter record.】

item.title: 日本外汇部门负责人称，必要时将与美国就日元问题保持密切沟通
item.description: 日本货币政策最高负责人三村明志表示，东京当局将与华盛顿同行密切协调，根据需要对外汇市场波动作出适当回应。【原文：Japan’s top currency chief Atsushi Mimura said authorities in Tokyo will respond to movements in the foreign exchange market appropriately as needed in close coordination with their counterparts in Washington.】

item.title: 美元承压加剧，进一步走弱的因素不断增多
item.description: 周一美元兑多数主要货币走弱，因投资者争论美国可能参与日本外汇干预的举措，将如何加剧市场对全球储备货币的负面情绪。【原文：The dollar weakened against most major peers Monday as investors debated how potential US involvement in foreign-exchange intervention in Japan might worsen sentiment toward the world’s reserve currency.】

item.title: 中国东乐饮料拟通过香港上市筹集最多13亿美元
item.description: 中国能量饮料制造商东乐饮料集团已开始接受投资者认购其在香港的二次上市，该交易可能筹集高达101亿港元（13亿美元），为香港今年迄今最繁忙的股票发行市场再添新篇。【原文：Chinese energy-drink maker Eastroc Beverage Group Co. has started taking investor orders for its second listing in Hong Kong that may fetch as much as HK$10.1 billion ($1.3 billion), fueling what has been among the busiest starts to the year for the city’s share sales.】

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特升至2018年以来最高水平，人工智能与经济增长乐观情绪助推
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特汇率升至2018年以来最高水平，主要得益于市场对该国人工智能供应链布局及经济增长前景的乐观预期。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit strengthened to the highest level since 2018, buoyed by optimism over the country’s ties to the artificial intelligence supply chain and the nation’s growth outlook.】

item.title: 伦敦生活水平提升速度是英国整体的两倍
item.description: 最新研究显示，伦敦生活水平的提升速度是英国其他地区的一倍多，这表明政界人士未能兑现其促进国家平等的承诺。【原文：Living standards in London have improved at more than double the pace of the rest of the UK, according to new research that suggests politicians are failing in their promises to make the country more equal.】

item.title: 中国低生育率并非奶粉供应商的末日
item.description: 中国惊人的低出生率，对海外奶粉供应商而言，未必如近期股市波动所暗示的那般灾难性。【原文：China’s shockingly low birthrate isn’t quite the calamity for overseas milk suppliers that some recent stock moves might suggest.】

item.title: 富达基金跑赢96%同类基金，青睐日本人工智能相关企业
item.description: 日本股市年初创下历史新高，这进一步强化了富达国际基金经理对小型人工智能相关企业的青睐——这些企业估值仍显合理。【原文：Japanese shares’ ascent to record highs at the start of the year has reinforced a Fidelity International fund manager’s preference for smaller AI-related companies that still look affordable.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟竞购战落幕
item.description: 派拉蒙需要提高报价以夺回主动权【原文：Paramount needs to raise its offer to reclaim the initiative】

item.title: 美国天然气价格受极地寒流影响，创2022年以来新高，突破每百万英热单位6美元大关
item.description: 美国天然气价格自2022年以来首次突破每百万英热单位6美元大关，因严寒天气席卷全国大部分地区，推高取暖需求并导致供应中断。【原文：US natural gas soared above $6 for the first time since 2022 as freezing weather swept across much of the country, boosting heating demand and disrupting supplies.】

item.title: 金价突破5000美元，全球动荡推动贵金属上涨
item.description: 金价首次突破每盎司5000美元大关，延续了此前惊人的涨势。这波涨势源于美国总统特朗普重塑国际关系，以及投资者纷纷撤离主权债券和货币市场。【原文：Gold rose beyond $5,000 an ounce for the first time, extending a breakneck rally fueled by US President Donald Trump’s reshaping of international relations and investor flight from sovereign bonds and currencies.】

item.title: 日本国债崩盘引发全球市场7万亿美元风险
item.description:
随着日本朝着首相高市早苗宣布的提前大选加速前进，预计将出现更多难以预测且剧烈的价格波动。【原文：

As the country hurtles towards the snap election called by Prime Minister Takaichi, more unpredictable and violent price swings are expected

】
